ygData.subject: Re: Charismatic Carillion
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to train at least one point in your wind skill in order to play the wind songs. Try that and see Weiland of Freeport Disciples of Truth Bard of the
ygData.messageBody:
You have to train at least one point in your wind skill in order to play the wind songs.

Try that and see

Weiland of Freeport
Disciples of Truth
Bard of the 18th Chorus
Erollisi Marr

I have a question on this song. I am a level 17 bard, and just recently acquired this song. I equipped my flute, and tried to play it. I got the following message: Learn to sing it before you play it. I proceeded to try and sing it, and could never get it going. Nothing but one missed note after the other. Is this common? Am I doing something wrong? Also, do I need a mouthpiece for my flute? I bought the flute from the Bard's Guild, and eqipped it as usual before I tried the song. Any help at all would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

Kirree
Xegony Server
